org.apache.ignite.internal.util

Class GridLogThrottle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.util.GridLogThrottle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LT

    public class GridLogThrottle
extends Object
    Grid log throttle.

    Errors are logged only if they were not logged for the last throttleTimeout number of minutes. Note that not only error messages are checked for duplicates, but also exception classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DFLT_THROTTLE_TIMEOUT
      Default throttle timeout in milliseconds (value is 5 * 60 * 1000).

    • Constructor Summary

      Ensure singleton.
